overview: Dim the Lights The days may be shorter and colder at this time of year, but in the series Dim the Lights these guys find ways to overcome their moods, lift their spirits, and have some hot fun in the process. Sean Ford and Nico Leon head up a cast of beautiful models - including Brock Banks, Austin Avery, Shane Cook, Mateo Vice, Cory Kane, and Gabriel Clark - that make the best of cold days by dimming the lights and having some sexy fun.
title: Dim the Lights
